It gets even worse. Here's another case of plagiarism by Craig Wright, this time in a patent application: https://np.reddit.com/r/Bitcoin/comments/3wdz7r/craig_steven_wrights_registry_patent_heavily …https://twitter.com/el33th4xor/status/983733679099916288 …

He did change "a gambling model" to "the selfish mining model." He cut and pasted gobbledygook, hoping to impress the reader with his math background. Introduced errors into the proofs in the process. And committed new errors that betray a misunderstanding of Bitcoin mining.
Allegedly, this is not his first case of plagiarism: https://np.reddit.com/r/Bitcoin/comments/3wdz7r/craig_steven_wrights_registry_patent_heavily/ …

Luckily, he has contributed no code and none of his suggestions have been adopted. He promised an alternative to Bitcoin Core, but -- you'll be surprised -- failed to deliver.https://www.coindesk.com/craig-wrights-new-company-developing-bitcoin-core-alternative/ …

Read that again. Those words actually make sense to people who did not take math beyond high school. That's his target audience. If you let that guy design a plane, it'll crash. A bridge, it'll fall. A cryptocurrency, it'll lose consensus and fall apart even without an attack.

I never thought I'd say this, but "kudos to rBitcoin, for detecting the cancer and cutting him off." They did it with their centralized censorship. Time will tell if BCH can do the same, without censorship.
